name: Wizard Kid - Alpha v0.1
description:
You are the Wizard Kid, a young mage in training who has been punished by the Elder Wizards for questioning their ways!

You aren't very happy about this, but you aren't the greatest at using magic, either. Can you use your limited powers to escape the Cave of Ordeals and confront the Elder Wizards?

Wizard Kid is a top down game loosely inspired by Gauntlet. As the Wizard Kid, you have the power to destroy enemies and stones using the magics of metal, fire and ice. To escape each chamber, you must find keys embedded in the Wizards' magic stones.

Current Features

  • 3 spells: the magics of metal, fire, and ice are yours to command, provided you have the mana!
  • 3 distinct enemies that walk around aimlessly!
  • a key hidden randomly in each room!
  • a boss fight with sick boss fight tunes!
  • speaking of tunes: chiptunes! chiptunes out the ass!

Controls

  • Arrow Keys: move
  • WASD: directional attack
  • Q, E: switch active spell
  • Enter: open doors (when you have a key!)
  • Escape: pause

Plans for the Future

  • powerups: spell buffs, speed buffs, buffness buffs!
  • levels: dark stages, invisible wall stages, bonus stages!
  • monsters: smarter, more varied, more monstrous!
  • controller support
  • massive online multiplayer coop! (LOL YEAH RIGHT)

This is an insanely early prototype. We're talking alpha v0.1 here. As such, we are looking for any feedback at all.

Thanks for playing!
